suite.name: CreateChareters

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/accounts path_url=/accounts headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.27.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '29', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"email": "gabiru@gmail.com"}'

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Create Characters
kw.msg: &{characters} = { name=Homem de Ferro | aliases=Iron Man | age=50 | team=Avengers | active=False }

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/characters path_url=/characters headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.27.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'client_key': '6202fe74751f850016db34f7', 'Content-Length': '97', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Homem de Ferro", "aliases": "Iron Man", "age": 50, "team": "Avengers", "active": false}'

suite.doc: Suite de teste para cadastrar personagem na API da marvel.
